title: Plat 5 Top Laner LFT
body:
No real rank requirement just a decent team.
Also highly pref top lane.

T1: Hec,Shen,Shyv (150k hec champion points)

T2: Maokai, Irelia,Olaf.

Any offers would be appreciated :) .

replies.body:
Evolution Oceania
We are looking for a skilled top laner to create massive pressure on the rift. 
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/Hej9yITq-dedicated-ranked-team-lfm
